subject: In Soft Tone
text:
A quiet day surrounds me 
and within me life faints. 
I feel close the fear of creatures
and am alone in my own peace.
Is there not in me the attention 
of verses and their quiet performance
woven into this small poem made of
some happiness and light sorrow? 

That you were near me once again
and I found you cool and pure
and understood in sadness 
the distance between you and I.
